analysis.description:
Pixiu.get_exchange_wei (/unique_chucks/22/0x3bf3b11023650d21140ba10c68a8a4dd0a372d3f.sol#417-441) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- Pixiu.tokenExchangeRateInWei

	-transfer (/unique_chucks/22/0x3bf3b11023650d21140ba10c68a8a4dd0a372d3f.sol#58)

ERC20 (/unique_chucks/22/0x3bf3b11023650d21140ba10c68a8a4dd0a372d3f.sol#66-75) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/22/0x3bf3b11023650d21140ba10c68a8a4dd0a372d3f.sol#68-69)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/22/0x3bf3b11023650d21140ba10c68a8a4dd0a372d3f.sol#69)

BasicToken (/unique_chucks/22/0x3bf3b11023650d21140ba10c68a8a4dd0a372d3f.sol#75-111) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/22/0x3bf3b11023650d21140ba10c68a8a4dd0a372d3f.sol#91-98)

StandardToken (/unique_chucks/22/0x3bf3b11023650d21140ba10c68a8a4dd0a372d3f.sol#119-171) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/22/0x3bf3b11023650d21140ba10c68a8a4dd0a372d3f.sol#126-139)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/22/0x3bf3b11023650d21140ba10c68a8a4dd0a372d3f.sol#145-156)

Pixiu (/unique_chucks/22/0x3bf3b11023650d21140ba10c68a8a4dd0a372d3f.sol#171-687) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/22/0x3bf3b11023650d21140ba10c68a8a4dd0a372d3f.sol#578-638)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/22/0x3bf3b11023650d21140ba10c68a8a4dd0a372d3f.sol#638-662)

Pixiu.get_exchange_wei (/unique_chucks/22/0x3bf3b11023650d21140ba10c68a8a4dd0a372d3f.sol#417-441) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- nowTime >= time1 && nowTime <= time2 (/unique_chucks/22/0x3bf3b11023650d21140ba10c68a8a4dd0a372d3f.sol#433-439)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/22/0x3bf3b11023650d21140ba10c68a8a4dd0a372d3f.sol:
